Package board

Class Board

java.lang.Object
board.Board
public final class Board extends Object
This class acts as the supervisor of the game, keeping information about the state of the game It also offers general methods that operate on the board This class cannot be inherited or instantiated, meaning it is purely static
Author:
Parth Patel, Yash Patel
